Body:
text_output = TextNotificationOutput(input_text)
console = ConsoleDisplay(show_notification_name=False, period=0, get_size=
    lambda : console_size)
cmd = create_cmd(lambda : console.draw(text_output))
result = CliRunner().invoke(cmd, catch_exceptions=False)
with open(expected_ascii_terminal_path, 'r') as f:
    expected_terminal_output = f.read()
self.assertEqual(expected_terminal_output, result.output)
parameterized.expand([((1, 1), '', resolve_data_path('empty.txt')), ((10, 3
    ), 'a', resolve_data_path('single-letter.txt')), ((10, 3), 'centred',
    resolve_data_path('single-centred-word.txt')), ((10, 3), "I'm centred",
    resolve_data_path('multiline-centred.txt')), ((10, 3),
    'Hello World! This is too long', resolve_data_path(
    'trim-multiline-centred.txt'))])
